SmartObject.sName: Give physics impulse to the player
SmartObject.sDescription: A simple example rule that gives the player a physics impulse when getting close to the SmartObject.

Class.name: Player
Class.description: Class used by the local player.

Class.name: SmartObject_Example
Class.description: Smart object class used in example rule.

State.name: Busy
State.description: This state is used to mark objects as busy.

State.name: Idle
State.description: This state is used to mark objects as idle.
